snippet.title: Brain Hotel Remastering
snippet.description:
Brain Hotel: Remodeled has it's Grand Re-Opening on Feb 28th!  Check out this quick behind the scenes look at what its like converting a 20 year old Flash game into a Modern 3D adventure!

Wishlist today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2648510/Brain_Hotel_Remodeled/
